member.name: T:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitterOrientation
member.summary: Specifies the orientation of the spliter.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets an id string applied for the "id" attribute of the split container element.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets a CSS style string applied for the "style" attribute of the split container element.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.Class
member.summary: Gets or sets a CSS class string applied for the "class" attribute of the split container element.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.FirstPane
member.summary: The left or top pane in the SplitContainer.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.SecondPane
member.summary: The right or bottom pane in the SplitContainer.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.Orientation
member.summary: Determines if the spliter is vertical or horizontal.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.FirstPaneMinSize
member.summary: Determines the minimum distance of pixels of the splitter from the left or the top edge of first pane.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.FirstPaneSize
member.summary:
Determines pixel distance of the splitter from the left or top edge.
You can specify the pane size to only either the or the parameter. If you specify both the or the parameters, then the splitter won't work.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.FirstPaneSizeChanged
member.summary: A callback that will be invoked when the size of the first pane is changed.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.SecondPaneMinSize
member.summary: Determines the minimum distance of pixels of the splitter from the right or the bottom edge of second pane.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.SecondPaneSize
member.summary:
Determines pixel distance of the splitter from the right or bottom edge.
You can specify the pane size to only either the or the parameter. If you specify both the or the parameters, then the splitter won't work.

member.name: P:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.SecondPaneSizeChanged
member.summary: A callback that will be invoked when the size of the second pane is changed.

member.name: M:Toolbelt.Blazor.Splitter.SplitContainer.#ctor
member.summary: Represents a component consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panes.
